name: C# LSP
description: C# language server for Claude Code, providing code intelligence and diagnostics.
longDescription: Integrates `csharp-ls` as a language server for C# files (`.cs`). Provides code intelligence including go-to-definition, find references, completions, and diagnostics. Requires .NET SDK 6.0 or later. Install via `dotnet tool install --global csharp-ls` or `brew install csharp-ls` on macOS.
